name: Fishards
description:
In this game you control a wizard fish with legs!

  • Magic - Combine 5 elements to create unique spells and defeat your opponents!

  • Multiplayer - To play simply join or host a room and play with strangers or friends!
  • Classes - Select your favourite combination of elements to create the perfect class that matches your play-style.
  • Gamemodes - Choose between Last Fish Standing, Free for all, Team Deathmatch and Protect Gooey God. More coming soon...
